title: Blade of Dimensions
description: Blade of Dimensions is an engaging clicker adventure where you can level up your swords, battle endless waves of monsters, and evolve your blades with unique upgrades. Unlock a plethora of swords and discover a wide array of monstrous creatures through two encyclopedias. Complete the in-game tutorial to receive valuable rewards and swiftly grasp the game's fundamentals. Challenge yourself to unearth all four secret swords, a feat only a few will master.
